   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Home
====================================

Explore our guides and examples for using SVL Simulator with SORA SVL.

Contributions are what make open source community such an amazing place to learn, inspire, and create. Any contributions you make are **greatly appreciated**.

This documentation is built with `Sphinx <https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/>`_.

Visit our GitHub repo `here <https://github.com/YuqiHuai/SORA-SVL>`_.

   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Python API

   python_api/guide
   python_api/quickstart
   python_api/dreamview

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Simulation User interface
   
   simulation_ui/configuration
